name: copilot-bridge
description: Local OpenAI-compatible chat endpoint bridging to GitHub Copilot via the VS Code Language Model API.

bridge.enabled.description: Start the Copilot Bridge automatically when VS Code starts.

bridge.host.description: Bind address for the local HTTP server. For security, keep this on loopback.

bridge.port.description: Port for the local HTTP server. 0 picks a random ephemeral port.

bridge.token.description: Optional bearer token required in Authorization header. Leave empty to disable.

bridge.historyWindow.description: Number of user/assistant turns to include (system message is kept separately).

bridge.maxConcurrent.description: Maximum concurrent /v1/chat/completions requests. Excess requests return 429.

bridge.verbose.description: Verbose logging to the 'Copilot Bridge' output channel.
